agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that helps user with travel planning. This includes getting travel locations based on cities or airports, getting travel availability, creating and updating travel reservations. You are to call on the other agents to perform these actions. Reject any requests that are outside of travel planning.

reachable_agents.scenario: Trigger this agent for weather information. Please include city or location to look up weather.
Trigger this agent for questions related to location search.
Trigger this agent for booking rental car reservations.
Trigger this agent to book flights. To make reservations, please indicate whether economy or business class, the departure date, and the airports for departure and arrival.
Trigger this agent for booking hotels. Please provide location and dates of arrival and departure.
Trigger this agent for help with trip budgeting.
Trigger this agent for restaurant recommendations.
Trigger this agent to get the latest information for events and attractions happening in an area.
Trigger this agent for booking airbnbs. Please provide location and dates of arrival and departure.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that will help gather weather information about given locations and cities. This will include details about the temperature and any details about other conditions like wind, rain, or snow.

actions.name: gettomorrowweatherbylocation
actions.description: Get the forcast for a location.

latitude.title: latitude
latitude.description: The latitude of the location you want to check. If you don't know the latitude, look it up [here](http://www.latlong.net). Example: `40.7127`.

longitude.title: longitude
longitude.description: The longitude of the location you want to check. If you don't know the longitude, look it up [here](http://www.latlong.net). Example: `-74.0059`.

actions.name: currentweatherbycity
actions.description: Gets the current weather conditions for a city.

units.title: units
units.description: Celsius or Fahrenheit. Default is Celsius.

actions.name: gettomorrowweatherbycity
actions.description: Get the forcast for a city.

actions.name: gettomorrowweatherbyzipcode
actions.description: Get the forcast for a zipcode.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that helps with location search. You will can look up nearby locations based on coordinates, return coordinates based on text input, or search for distance between two locations.

tools.name: LocationService
tools.description: Supports geocoding (looking up locations/places), reverse-geocoding (getting nearby locations for given coordinates), and routing (getting distance between locations).

actions.name: searchbycoordinates
actions.description: Conducts a search for places near particular coordinates.

coordinates.title: coordinates
coordinates.description: Coordinates in latitude and longitude of the location (comma-separated, e.g. 40.7484,73.9857).

actions.name: searchbytext
actions.description: Search for places (geocoding) with freeform text (address, name, city, or region). The search can be narrowed by specifying categories, or nearby coordinates.

text.title: text
text.description: Search text used to suggest places, such as addresses, cities, places of interest, or regions.

coordinates.title: coordinates
coordinates.description: Comma-separated coordinates (latitude,longitude) of the location used to bias the search to prefer results closer to a particular position.

categories.title: categories
categories.description: A comma-separated list of categories used to filter places returned. If multiple categories are provided, the results will match _any_ of the listed categories.

actions.name: calculatedistance
actions.description: Calculate the travel distance between an origin and destination location.

origin.title: origin
origin.description: Coordinates in latitude and longitude of the origin (comma-separated).

destination.title: destination
destination.description: Coordinates in latitude and longitude of the destination (comma-separated).

travel_mode.title: travel_mode
travel_mode.description: The mode of transport used when calculating a route. Either `Car`, `Walking`, or `Bicycle`.

distance_unit.title: distance_unit
distance_unit.description: The units used when returning the distance, either `Kilometers` or `Miles`

actions.name: getcurrentcoordinates
actions.description: Returns the latitude and longitude for the current device.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that helps with car rentals. This includes getting rental car locations based on cities or airports, getting car availability, creating and updating reservations.

actions.name: getcarlocations
actions.description: Retrieves a list of rental car locations based on geographic keywords, airports, or cities.

rental_car_brand.title: rental_car_brand
rental_car_brand.description: Brand name of the rental car company to search for.

location_keyword.title: location_keyword
location_keyword.description: Location keyword or phrase to search by.

actions.name: getcaravailability
actions.description: Searches for available rental cars for a given rental car location, dates, brand, and other parameters.

rental_car_brand.title: rental_car_brand
rental_car_brand.description: Brand name of the rental car company to search for.

pickup_date.title: pickup_date
pickup_date.description: Date and time of car pickup.

pickup_location.title: pickup_location
pickup_location.description: Location code for picking up rental car.

dropoff_date.title: dropoff_date
dropoff_date.description: Date and time of car dropoff.

dropoff_location.title: dropoff_location
dropoff_location.description: Location code for dropping off rental car.

driver_age.title: driver_age
driver_age.description: Age of driver, which may influence rates.

seats.description: number of seats in the vehicle

rate.description: daily rental rate of the vehicle

actions.name: createreservation
actions.description: Creates a rental car reservation based on a selected rental class, dates, location, and other parameters. Returns price estimates and a confirmation number.

rental_car_brand.title: rental_car_brand
rental_car_brand.description: Brand name of the rental car company to search for.

pickup_date.title: pickup_date
pickup_date.description: Date and time of car pickup.

pickup_location.title: pickup_location
pickup_location.description: Location code for picking up rental car.

dropoff_date.title: dropoff_date
dropoff_date.description: Date and time of car dropoff.

dropoff_location.title: dropoff_location
dropoff_location.description: Location code for dropping off rental car.

vehicle_class.title: vehicle_class
vehicle_class.description: Type of vehicle to reserve, e.g. compact, standard,luxury, SUV, minivan, etc.

driver_first_name.title: driver_first_name
driver_first_name.description: First name of rental car driver.

driver_last_name.title: driver_last_name
driver_last_name.description: Last name of rental car driver.

driver_dob.title: driver_dob
driver_dob.description: Date of birth of the driver, which influences rates.

driver_license_state.title: driver_license_state
driver_license_state.description: State from which the driver's license was issued

insurance.title: insurance
insurance.description: Selected coverage/insurance options like liability (LIS), collision damage waiver (CDW), personal accident insurance (PAI),or personal effects insurance (PEC).

add_ons.title: add_ons
add_ons.description: Rental add-ons like GPS, E-ZPass, etc.

confirmation_number.description: The confirmation number of the reservation.

estimated_price.description: The estimated price for the reservation.

actions.name: viewreservation
actions.description: Retrieves details about an existing rental car reservation based on a confirmation number and last name.

confirmation_number.title: confirmation_number
confirmation_number.description: Confirmation number for the rental car reservation (returned after creating a reservation).

driver_last_name.title: driver_last_name
driver_last_name.description: Last name of rental car driver/reservation holder.

seats.description: Number of seats in the car

doors.description: Number of doors in the car

pickup_date.description: The date on which the car is picked up.

rental_car_brand.description: The brand of the rental car company

dropoff_date.description: The date on which the car is dropped off.

rental_car_brand.description: The brand of the rental car company

actions.name: updatereservation
actions.description: Updates the details of an existing rental car reservation.

confirmation_number.title: confirmation_number
confirmation_number.description: Confirmation number for the rental car reservation (returned after creating a reservation).

rental_car_brand.title: rental_car_brand
rental_car_brand.description: Brand name of the rental car company to search for.

pickup_date.title: pickup_date
pickup_date.description: Date and time of car pickup.

pickup_location.title: pickup_location
pickup_location.description: Location code for picking up rental car.

dropoff_date.title: dropoff_date
dropoff_date.description: Date and time of car dropoff.

dropoff_location.title: dropoff_location
dropoff_location.description: Location code for dropping off rental car.

vehicle_class.title: vehicle_class
vehicle_class.description: Type of vehicle to reserve, e.g. compact, standard,luxury, SUV, minivan, etc.

driver_first_name.title: driver_first_name
driver_first_name.description: First name of rental car driver.

driver_last_name.title: driver_last_name
driver_last_name.description: Last name of rental car driver.

driver_dob.title: driver_dob
driver_dob.description: Date of birth of the driver, which influences rates.

driver_license_state.title: driver_license_state
driver_license_state.description: State from which the driver's license was issued

insurance.title: insurance
insurance.description: Selected coverage/insurance options like liability (LIS), collision damage waiver (CDW), personal accident insurance (PAI),or personal effects insurance (PEC).

add_ons.title: add_ons
add_ons.description: Rental add-ons like GPS, E-ZPass, etc.

actions.name: cancelreservation
actions.description: Cancels an existing rental car reservation.

confirmation_number.title: confirmation_number
confirmation_number.description: Confirmation number for the rental car reservation (returned after creating a reservation).

driver_last_name.title: driver_last_name
driver_last_name.description: Last name of rental car driver/reservation holder.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that manages flight bookings.

tools.name: BookFlight
tools.description: This tool manages a flight booking workflow.

actions.name: searchflights
actions.description: Search a flight given a departure and arrival location and dates.

departure_airport.title: departure_airport
departure_airport.description: Departure location. get_airport_code can retrieve the location code.

arrival_airport.title: arrival_airport
arrival_airport.description: Arrival location. get_airport_code can retrieve the location code.

departure_date.title: departure_date
departure_date.description: Departure Date in the MM/DD/YYYY format

num_tickets.title: num_tickets
num_tickets.description: The number of tickets. If not provided defaults to 1

actions.name: getairportcode
actions.description: Retrieve the code of the closest airports.

query.title: query
query.description: A natural language representation of the location. For example, a city name or an address.

actions.name: bookflight
actions.description: Book a flight.

itinerary_number.title: itinerary_number
itinerary_number.description: The itinerary number can be retrieved from Search Flights API.  An itinerary can have multiple flights (each of them with a flight number).

departure_date.title: departure_date
departure_date.description: Departure Date in the MM/DD/YYYY format

class.title: class
class.description: The class of the ticket (Economy, Business)

confirmation_number.description: The confirmation number of the flight.

itinerary_number.description: The Itinerary number of the flight.

departure_airport.description: The name of the departure airport.

arrival_airport.description: The name of the arrival airport.

departure_time.description: The time of departure of the flight.

arrival_time.description: The time of arrival at the airport.

starting_price.description: The initial price of the flight.

actions.name: getflightdetails
actions.description: get more details about the flight. For example, the type of aircraft being used.

departure_date.title: departure_date
departure_date.description: Departure Date in the MM/DD/YYYY format

aircraft_type.description: The type of aircraft being used.

actions.name: getavailableseats
actions.description: Provides several possibilities for seat allocation.

area.title: area
area.description: A full row (alphabet letter) can be provided and the function will return seats in the neighboring rows.

available_seats.description: The available seats in the flight.

actions.name: selectseat
actions.description: Select a seat location.

description.description: The description of selected seat location.

actions.name: cancelticket
actions.description: Cancel a reservation.

refund_request.title: refund_request
refund_request.description: Some ticket can be refunded for specific reasons the customer can provide the reason for the refund request.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that handles hotel reservations. This includes searching for hotels, creating and deleting reservations.

tools.name: BookHotel
tools.description: This tool handles hotel booking and reservation management workflows.

actions.name: viewreservation
actions.description: Inspect the details of an existing reservation.

confirmation_number.title: confirmation_number
confirmation_number.description: The confirmation number for the booking.

hotel_id.description: The hotel id of the reservation.

hotel_name.description: The hotel name of the reservation.

actions.name: cancelreservation
actions.description: Cancel a pre-existing reservation.

confirmation_number.title: confirmation_number
confirmation_number.description: The confirmation number for the booking.

message.description: The message confirming the cancellation details.

actions.name: searchhotel
actions.description: Search for a hotel in a location. The list can be filtered by room availability (in a timeframe), a query, or the star rating.

location.title: location
location.description: A location. This is a simple string that can contain an address or a city.

from_date.title: from_date
from_date.description: Arrival Date. If present, Departure Date needs to be present.

to_date.title: to_date
to_date.description: Departure Date. If present, Arrival Date needs to be present.

query.title: query
query.description: A query that it is used to filter results based on keyword match.

star_ratings.title: star_ratings
star_ratings.description: A filter based on the star rating of the hotel. This parameter accepts a list of comma-separated values. For example “3, 4, 5”.

actions.name: getavailablerooms
actions.description: Get the available rooms types for the given hotel.

hotel_id.title: hotel_id
hotel_id.description: The unique identifier for the hotel.

num_people.description: The number of people the room can accommodate.

breakfast_included.description: True if breakfast is included or false.

actions.name: gethoteldetails
actions.description: Provides additional details about the hotel (like amenities).

hotel_id.title: hotel_id
hotel_id.description: The unique identifier for the hotel.

actions.name: bookhotel
actions.description: Book a Hotel.

hotel_id.title: hotel_id
hotel_id.description: The unique identifier for the hotel.

from_date.description: Start date of the hotel booking.

to_date.description: End date of the hotel booking.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that decides whether the trip meets budget constraints. You will need to take into account the cost of travel and accomodation, and possibly other fares that may be expensed during the trip.

actions.name: calculate
actions.description: Resolving a mathematical expression (written in Python syntax)"

actions.name: convert

result.description: The result of conversion from input to output units.

actions.name: generaterandomnumber
actions.description: Generate a random integer in some range (default: 0 - 1000)

result.description: A random number in the specified range.

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that will recommend restaurants in a particular location. You will be responsible for getting details about restaurants including its operation hours and ratings.

tools.name: FoodDelivery_V2
tools.description: This API is used to deliver food to the customer's location. A user can get food delivered at their location from their preferred restaurant.

actions.name: additem
actions.description: Add an item to the shopping cart. All the items in the shopping cart need to come from the same restaurant

item_name.title: item_name
item_name.description: The name of the item to be added to the shopping cart.

restaurant_zip_code.title: restaurant_zip_code
restaurant_zip_code.description: The zip code of the restaurant

quantity.title: quantity
quantity.description: Represents the quantity of items to add

status.description: The status of adding item.  0: Not added. 1: Added.

actions.name: clearshoppingcart
actions.description: Clear the entire shopping cart, removing all items.

actions.name: getshoppingcart
actions.description: Gets the list of the items currently present in the user shopping cart as well.

cart.description: The list of items in the cart.

actions.name: gettotalprice
actions.description: Returns the total price of the item currently in the shopping cart.

price.description: The total price of the item.

actions.name: checkout
actions.description: Finalize the order to be delivered at the desired location. The function uses the payment method on file to complete the transaction.

address.title: address
address.description: The address where to deliver the food. If not provided, the function uses the address on file.

zip_code.title: zip_code
zip_code.description: The zip code where to deliver the food. If not provided, the function uses the address on file.

city.title: city
city.description: The city where to deliver the food. If not provided, the function uses the address on file.

orderId.description: The unique order id for the user.

ETA.description: The estimated time of arrival for the order.

total_cost.description: The total cost of the order.

actions.name: search
actions.description: Searches a restaurant by dish, restaurant or cuisine

query.title: query
query.description: The query is a string that can be either a dish name, a restaurant name or a cuisine type.

zip_code.title: zip_code
zip_code.description: The zip code where to look for restaurants. If not provided, the function uses the address on file.

actions.name: getmenu
actions.description: Retrieves the full menu for a given restaurant

restaurant_zip_code.title: restaurant_zip_code
restaurant_zip_code.description: The zip code of the restaurant

actions.name: checkorderstatus
actions.description: Returns the status of the order: in progress, delivering, delivered

status.description: The status of the api response.

ETA.description: The delivery time estimate in format

actions.name: searchrestaurants
actions.description: Search restaurants matching given criteria near a particular address or location name

location.title: location
location.description: Address or location keyword/phrase to search for

query.title: query
query.description: Keyword/phrase describing cuisine type or restaurant name for search for

price_range.title: price_range
price_range.description: Comma-separated price ranges to consider, including `Cheap`, `Moderate` and/or `Expensive`

features.title: features
features.description: Comma-separated list desired of features, including `takes_reservations`, `delivers`, `has_outdoor_eating`, `allows_dogs`, `good_for_groups`,  and/or `kid_friendly`

open_date_time.title: open_date_time
open_date_time.description: Includes restaurants that are open at a particular date/time

ratings.description: Number of ratings for the restaurant

aggregate_rating.description: Overall rating of the restaurant out of 5

categories.description: List of categories of restaurant, i.e. types of cuisine or drinks served

features.description: List of features of restaurant including `takes_reservations`, `delivers`, `has_outdoor_eating`, `allows_dogs`, `good_for_groups`,  and/or `kid_friendly

price_range.description: Price range of the restaurant, either `Cheap`, `Moderate` and/or `Expensive`

actions.name: getrestaurant
actions.description: Retrieves information about a particular restaurant by its ID

ratings.description: Number of ratings for the restaurant

aggregate_rating.description: Overall rating of the restaurant out of 5

categories.description: List of categories of restaurant, i.e. types of cuisine or drinks served

features.description: List of features of restaurant including `takes_reservations`, `delivers`, `has_outdoor_eating`, `allows_dogs`, `good_for_groups`,  and/or `kid_friendly

price_range.description: Price range of the restaurant, either `Cheap`, `Moderate` or `Expensive`

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that curates local experiences for travel destinations. You recommend relevant events and activities while providing insider tips, and recent news to offer an authentic local perspective during the travel dates.

tools.name: Eventbrite
tools.description: Create, manage, promote, and sell out your event

actions.name: newattendeecheckin
actions.description: Enables an attendee to check-in at an event.

order_id.title: order_id
order_id.description: The order identifier that was sent to the user's email when the ordered tickets.

actions.name: neworderevent
actions.description: Place an order for tickets to an event. This contains only the event and user information.

event_id.title: event_id
event_id.description: Event ID for the event you want to book tickets to. This can be obtained from return of the search or create event call.

email.title: email
email.description: Email for the user where event tickets will be sent.

num_tickets.title: num_tickets
num_tickets.description: The number of tickets the user wants to buy for the event.

ok.description: True/False whether order was placed or not

order_id.description: The order id for the placed order

actions.name: searchevent
actions.description: Finds an event within an organization.

organization.title: organization
organization.description: The organization that is organizing the event

query.title: query
query.description: Keywords or query string that we will search for in the event name or its description.

start.description: The start date of the event

end.description: The end date of the event

cost.description: The cost of the event (if any)

currency.description: The currency of the cost (if any)

actions.name: createevent
actions.description: Creates an event within an organization.

organization.title: organization
organization.description: The organization that is organizing the event

event_description.title: event_description
event_description.description: A small summary describing the event.

cost.title: cost
cost.description: The cost of ticket for the event.

currency.title: currency
currency.description: The currency in which the tickets are priced.

listed.title: listed
listed.description: Is this event publicly searchable on Eventbrite?

ok.description: True/False whether the event created or not

url.description: Url to get the event details

tools.name: NewsSearch
tools.description: Retrieve breaking news and headlines for a particular country.

actions.name: sources
actions.description: Retrieve a curated list of top news article publishers.

query.title: query
query.description: Search for the ID of a particular source like "The New York Times"

category.title: category
category.description: Category of headline to search for under either `entertainment`, `sports`, `business`, `technology`, or `general`

actions.name: search
actions.description: Search for keywords/phrases across all available articles.

query.title: query
query.description: Keywords/phrases to search for in the text of the article body or title

searchFields.title: searchFields
searchFields.description: Fields to restrict search to, either `title` or `body`

sources.title: sources
sources.description: Comma-separated list of sources to include the search

domains.title: domains
domains.description: Comma-separated list of domain names (e.g. washingtonpost.com) to restrict search to

fromDate.title: fromDate
fromDate.description: Start date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD) of oldest article allowed

toDate.title: toDate
toDate.description: End date in ISO 8601 format (YYYY-MM-DD) of most recent article allowed

orderBy.title: orderBy
orderBy.description: Criteria to prioritize in search, either `relevance`, `popularity` or `recency`. `relevance` is used by default.

source.description: Contains information about the article's source.

published.description: The date the article was published.

actions.name: headlines
actions.description: Retrieve breaking news and headlines for a particular category.

sources.title: sources
sources.description: Comma-separated list of source IDs to include the search

category.title: category
category.description: Category of headline to search for under either `entertainment`, `sports`, `business`, `technology`, or `general`

agents.agent_instruction: You are an agent that handles Airbnb reservations. This includes searching for airbnbs, creating and deleting reservations.

tools.name: BookAirbnb
tools.description: This tool handles airbnb booking and reservation management workflows.

actions.name: viewreservation
actions.description: Inspect the details of an existing reservation.

confirmation_number.title: confirmation_number
confirmation_number.description: The confirmation number for the booking.

airbnb_id.description: The airbnb id of the reservation.

airbnb_name.description: The airbnb name of the reservation.

actions.name: cancelreservation
actions.description: Cancel a pre-existing reservation.

confirmation_number.title: confirmation_number
confirmation_number.description: The confirmation number for the booking.

message.description: The message confirming the cancellation details.

actions.name: searchairbnb
actions.description: Search for a airbnb in a location. The list can be filtered by availability (in a timeframe), a query.

location.title: location
location.description: A location. This is a simple string that can contain an address or a city.

from_date.title: from_date
from_date.description: Arrival Date. If present, Departure Date needs to be present.

to_date.title: to_date
to_date.description: Departure Date. If present, Arrival Date needs to be present.

query.title: query
query.description: A query that it is used to filter results based on keyword match.

star_ratings.title: star_ratings
star_ratings.description: A filter based on the star rating of the airbnb. This parameter accepts a list of comma-separated values. For example “3, 4, 5”.

actions.name: getairbnbdetails
actions.description: Provides additional details about the airbnb (like amenities).

airbnb_id.title: airbnb_id
airbnb_id.description: The unique identifier for the airbnb.

actions.name: bookairbnb
actions.description: Book a airbnb.

airbnb_id.title: airbnb_id
airbnb_id.description: The unique identifier for the airbnb.

from_date.description: Start date of the airbnb booking.

to_date.description: End date of the airbnb booking.
